title: Acropolis
text: Breath taking and a main attraction here in Athens! We were mesmerized with its size, history, details and beauty! It is a place to visit. It is actually the most important monument to visit and the most impacting!

title: Best place to eat in Athen! By far the best!!!
text: The service by Dimitris, Sava and Ilias was by far the best we have seen received here in Athens, Greece! The restaurant makes delicious food and the price you pay is very competitive with other restaurants! The climate and restaurant feel is perfect for couples. FIVE STARS on four counts: food, service, ATMOSPHERE and price!They made us want to come back with its superb treat and service!! Thank you!
